impressive, but what most people

developing a team that may, in

Coached by Sidney Silverman,
the rifle team defeated Morgan

and a Gettysburg College squad

years.

Trout Lewis, had an average of
249, second only to teammate
Marti Altepeter's 251. These two

led a team composed of John
Hynan, Tom Steenland, Karl
Schneider, David Sill, John
Broughton, William Winn and
James Horns.

senior on the squad. All of the
other members will be back next
year, hoping both for increased
student support, and opponents
capable of giving them a decent
match.
The team is shooting a
post-season exhibition match
tomorrow against Western
Maryland. The match starts at
10:00 am, and will be in the
basement of the ROTC building.
All Hopkins students are
encouraged to attend and see a
Hopkins dynasty in action.
